amendment.description: Amendment extends youth participant eligibility from 21 years of age to 24 years of age.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-92 to extend the eligibility criteria age for those to be served by the programs that are intended to target services to out of school youth to24 years old.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (GA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
